title: Canonical product trust object IDs with domain separation

acceptance_criteria.AC1_domain_prefixes: PASS — 6 domain prefixes (ext:, tcard:, rcpt:, pchk:, migr:, vclaim:) registered
acceptance_criteria.AC3_parse_validate: PASS — parse/validate round-trip for all domain prefixes
acceptance_criteria.AC4_cross_domain: PASS — cross-domain collisions structurally impossible via prefix scheme
acceptance_criteria.AC5_representations: PASS — short-form (8 hex chars) and full-form representations
acceptance_criteria.AC6_deterministic: PASS — same inputs always produce identical IDs
acceptance_criteria.AC7_sha256: PASS — SHA-256 with 256-bit digest (>= 128 bits collision resistance)
